StudyInfo.StudyNameEntrez: NHLBI TOPMed: Children's Health Study (Effects of Air Pollution on the Development of Obesity in Children)

Person.Organization: UNIVERSITY OF ILLINOIS AT CHICAGOUNIVERSITY OF CHICAGO

Policy.acknowledgement_statement: The TOPMed acknowledgement statement can be found at: https://topmed.nhlbi.nih.gov/acknowledgements In addition please include: "Whole genome sequencing (WGS) for the Trans-Omics in Precision Medicine (TOPMed) program was supported by the National Heart, Lung and Blood Institute (NHLBI). WGS for TOPMed <NHLBI TOPMed: Asthma Translational Genomics Collaborative (ATGC) (grant number: 1X01HL134589-01)> was performed at <Northwest Genomics Center of University of Washington (contract number: HHSN268201600032I/HHSN26800002) >. Centralized read mapping and genotype calling, along with variant quality metrics and filtering were provided by the TOPMed Informatics Research Center (3R01HL-117626-02S1). Phenotype harmonization, data management, sample-identity QC, and general study coordination, were provided by the TOPMed Data Coordinating Center (3R01HL-120393-02S1). We gratefully acknowledge the studies and participants who provided biological samples and data for TOPMed. The original Effects of Air Pollution on the Development of Obesity in Children study was supported by the Southern California Children’s Environmental Health Center (SC-CEHC) grant funded by the National Institutes of Environmental Health Sciences (grant number: P01ES022845) and Environmental Protection Agency (grant number: RD-83544101-0)."
Policy.ic_specific_access_term: Use of the data is limited only by the terms of the model Data Use Certification.

GSR_Access.gsr_mode_label: Unrestricted access (institution responded that the study is not sensitive without submitting a new Institutional Certification)

ConsentGroup.title: General Research Use
ConsentGroup.name: GRU
ConsentGroup.Use-Restriction: Use of the data is limited only by the terms of the model Data Use Certification.

ConsentGroup.title: Exchange Area
ConsentGroup.name: EA
ConsentGroup.Use-Restriction: Use by NHLBI TOPMed study investigators only. Use of the data is limited only by the terms of the model Data Use Certification.

StudyTo.name: NHLBI Big Data Analysis Heart Failure Challenge Data Collection
